```{r echo=FALSE}
ds <- read.csv("./Baby study GSV scores.csv")
```

# BSID_GSV_COG

```{r echo=FALSE}
# fit the model
set.seed(3654)
tau2=c(0.05, 0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 0.9, 0.95)
mform <-gcrq(data=ds, bsid_gsv_cog ~ ps(age_visit_m, monotone=1), tau=tau2)
```

## Very basic plot

```{r echo=FALSE}
# very basic plots
# plot curves - res option controls whether individual data points are plotted
plot(mform, res=TRUE)
plot(mform, res=FALSE)
```

## Plot as in vignette

```{r echo=FALSE}
# plot per vignette
p <- plot(mform, legend=TRUE, overlap=15, grid=list(x=15,y=10), col=2, lty=1,ylab="BSID GSV COG", xlab="AGE (MONTHS)")
```

## Create individual curves for each value of tau and combine in one plot

Not sure why the lines cross

```{r echo=FALSE}

par(mar=c(3,3,3,2) + 0.1)

                ylim=c(300,700), xlim=c(0, 42), lwd=2, tck=0.02)
```
